name: Notion Workspace Management - Login, Page Creation, Database and Task Management Flow
description: Verify user login, workspace navigation, page creation, database creation with properties, task management, and content organization
steps: Navigate to https://notion.so/login
Enter email 'inbaperson' in the email input field
Click the 'Continue with email' button to proceed
Enter password 'K7#mP9$vL2@xQ8!' in the password input field
Click the 'Continue with password' or 'Sign in' button to authenticate
Verify successful login by checking for Notion workspace or getting started page
Click the '+ New page' button in the sidebar or use the keyboard shortcut
In the page title field with placeholder 'Untitled', enter 'QA Test Project'
In the content area, type '/table' to open the block menu for creating a table database
Select 'Table - Inline' from the dropdown menu options
Click the '+' icon to add a new property and select 'Status' from the property type options
Name the new property 'Status' and configure status options: 'Not Started', 'In Progress', 'Completed'
Click the '+' icon again and select 'Date' from the property type options
Name the new property 'Due Date'
Click in the first row under the 'Name' column and enter the task name 'Design login page mockup'
Press Tab to move to the 'Tags' column and add a tag 'Design' by typing and pressing Enter
Press Tab to move to the 'Status' column and select 'In Progress'
Press Tab to move to the 'Due Date' column and select February 10, 2026
Click the '+ New' button to add a second task
In the second row, enter task name 'Implement authentication API'
Add tag 'Backend', set status to 'Not Started', and set due date to February 20, 2026
Click on the first task 'Design login page mockup' to open it as a page
In the task page content area, add a heading by typing '/heading1' and enter text 'Task Description'
Below the heading, add task description: 'Create mockups for the login page including desktop and mobile views'
Add a to-do list by typing '/todo' or '[]'
Create checklist item 'Research design patterns' and press Enter
Add second checklist item 'Create wireframes' and press Enter
Check the first checklist item 'Research design patterns'
Verify the item shows as completed with a checkmark and strikethrough
Scroll down and add a comment: 'Working on the initial wireframes today'
Press 'Comment' button or Ctrl+Enter to post the comment
Click the back arrow or breadcrumb to return to 'QA Test Project' page
Click the 'Board' view option in the table header to switch to Kanban board view
Drag the card 'Implement authentication API' from 'Not Started' to 'In Progress' column
Verify the card moves to the 'In Progress' column
Switch back to 'Table' view by clicking the view selector
Right-click on 'QA Test Project' in the sidebar
Select 'Add to Favorites' from the context menu
Verify the page appears in the 'Favorites' section at the top of the sidebar
Click the user profile icon in the top right corner
Click 'Log out' to sign out of Notion
Verify successful logout by checking the redirect to the login page or Notion homepage
